casebody.data:
MERCANTILE NATIONAL BANK OF DALLAS, TEXAS and Berry Bros. Machinery Company v. W. J. BRIGGLE CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION. In the Matter of W. J. Briggle Construction Corporation. No. 7305. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. April 24, 1963. Marvin Jones, Dallas, Tex., and W. H. Erickson, Denver, Colo., for appellants. James Bounds, Hugo, Okl., and Joe Stamper, Antlers, Okl., for appellee.

Before PICKETT and BREITEN-STEIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed April 24, 1963, on motion of appellants.
